title: Hard Mode: enforce revealed hints in subsequent guesses
body:
Implement a Hard Mode that enforces use of revealed information in all subsequent guesses.

Scope:
- Enforce green letters: position must remain fixed
- Enforce yellow letters: minimum counts must be respected across duplicates
- Add validation messages for violations

Acceptance Criteria:
- Submissions violating Hard Mode rules are blocked with a localized message
- Unit tests cover duplicate-letter edge cases

title: Word Provider: Addressables + CCD language packs
body:
Migrate dictionaries from Resources to Addressables, with CCD-hosted language packs for live updates.

Scope:
- AddressablesWordProvider with async loading
- Language Pack asset(s): keyboard layout + word lists per length
- CCD pipeline + documentation for adding new languages post-release

Acceptance Criteria:
- Dictionaries load via Addressables; CCD update flows without app update
- Clear docs: how to add a new language pack

title: Interactive Tutorial (guided first session)
body:
Replace static instructions with a guided tutorial that highlights UI elements and steps through a sample turn.

Scope:
- Scriptable steps (overlay + callouts)
- Skip / replay support

Acceptance Criteria:
- First session shows tutorial, can be skipped and re-opened later

title: Global Leaderboards (UGS)
body:
Integrate UGS Leaderboards for Daily mode (fewest attempts; tie-break by time).

Scope:
- Submit score on win in Daily
- Leaderboard panel (top N + player rank)
- Basic anti-abuse (server-side constraints, result sanity checks)

Acceptance Criteria:
- Scores visible across devices and users; consistent ordering

title: Achievements (Google Play Games)
body:
Add a set of achievements (e.g., first win, 10 wins, 5-day streak, Hard Mode win) via Google Play Games.

Scope:
- GPGS integration and IDs mapping
- Trigger on relevant events

Acceptance Criteria:
- Achievements unlock and display correctly on Android

title: Monetization (Ads): interstitials + optional rewarded
body:
Add monetization with minimal friction: interstitial after completed game (frequency capping), optional rewarded for a hint (future).

Scope:
- Choose network (AdMob/LevelPlay)
- Frequency capping and test device setup
- Settings toggle to disable ads (dev only)

Acceptance Criteria:
- Ads displayed according to rules; no crashes or layout issues

title: Analytics: expand event set and data layer
body:
Build on minimal analytics: add a data layer + richer events for funnels and cohorts.

Scope:
- Standardize event schema (context: lang, wordLength, mode, hardMode, attempts)
- Add events: tutorial_start/end, share_click, leaderboard_open, theme_change
- Basic privacy toggle and docs

Acceptance Criteria:
- Events visible in dashboard with consistent schema

title: Cloud Save: sync stats and streak cross-device
body:
Sync player statistics and daily streak using UGS Cloud Save.

Scope:
- Serialize StatsData for cloud
- Conflict resolution (last-write-wins or timestamp-based)

Acceptance Criteria:
- Stats and streak persist across reinstalls/devices for same player

title: Remote Config: feature flags and A/B testing
body:
Control features remotely and run simple experiments.

Scope:
- Feature flags (e.g., theme auto, hint button)
- Remote parameters (e.g., daily word source fallback)
- Safe defaults when offline

Acceptance Criteria:
- Flags/params can be switched without app update

title: Localization: add new languages + keyboard layouts
body:
Extend localization beyond EN/PL and support language-specific keyboard rows/diacritics.

Scope:
- Add at least 2 languages (e.g., ES, DE)
- Provide dictionaries + keyboard layouts per language
- Docs: how to contribute a language pack

Acceptance Criteria:
- Language can be switched; UI updates instantly (or on restart as designed)

title: Visual Themes: high-contrast and colorblind-friendly palettes
body:
Add accessibility-friendly theme presets with higher contrast and colorblind-safe hues.

Scope:
- Tokens for high-contrast and colorblind modes
- Toggle in Settings

Acceptance Criteria:
- Themes pass basic contrast checks; no illegible states

title: Accessibility improvements: font scaling, focus order, hints
body:
Improve accessibility with larger text options, better focus navigation, and textual hints.

Scope:
- Font scale setting
- Logical focus traversal order
- Text alternatives for icon-only buttons

Acceptance Criteria:
- App usable with increased text size; focus order predictable

title: Audio/Haptics: advanced controls and asset delivery
body:
Add volume toggles, sound categories, and addressables for audio clips; refine haptic patterns.

Scope:
- SFX mixer groups and settings
- Addressables for audio (optional)
- Refined haptic feedback patterns

Acceptance Criteria:
- Users can toggle/adjust audio; haptics are responsive, non-intrusive

title: Offline-first: caching daily word and robust fallback
body:
Ensure graceful offline behavior with a cached daily word and retry policy.

Scope:
- Cache last fetched daily word + date
- Retry/backoff when Cloud Code fails
- UI indicator for offline mode

Acceptance Criteria:
- Daily playable offline (with last-known word) when server unreachable

title: Crash reporting & diagnostics
body:
Integrate crash reporting (Unity Cloud Diagnostics or Firebase Crashlytics) and log breadcrumbs for key flows.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Crashes visible in dashboard with device/context info

title: CI/CD: Unity Cloud Build + GitHub Actions
body:
Automate builds and tests.

Scope:
- GitHub Actions: unit tests + build artifacts (AAB)
- Unity Cloud Build setup for Android

Acceptance Criteria:
- Successful CI pipeline on PR and main branch

title: Tests: Core and PlayMode coverage
body:
Add unit tests for Core (guess evaluation, duplicates, hard mode) and basic PlayMode tests for UI flows.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Coverage on critical paths; tests run in CI

title: Store listing localization & ASO
body:
Localize store listing (title, short/long description, screenshots) and apply basic ASO.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Localized listings published; consistent branding

title: QA: device matrix and performance profiling
body:
Establish a device test matrix and routine profiling.

Scope:
- Low/mid/high Android devices
- Record FPS, memory, GC spikes; address regressions

Acceptance Criteria:
- Profiling reports exist; obvious bottlenecks addressed

title: Server-side result validation (basic anti-cheat)
body:
Add basic server-side validation for Daily results to reduce trivial spoofing.

Scope:
- Cloud Code sanity checks (attempt count bounds, time window)
- Optional: signed payload from server

Acceptance Criteria:
- Obvious cheats detected; no false positives in normal play

title: In-app review prompt
body:
Prompt users for a review after positive sessions.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Review dialog appears under configured conditions; does not nag excessively

title: Shareable Results 2.0: image share with branding
body:
Upgrade from text-only to an image share (grid + brand) for social platforms.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Share intent attaches an image preview; layout looks clean on major apps

title: Keyboard: diacritics and long-press behavior
body:
Enhance the keyboard for languages with diacritics (where applicable) and consider long-press for variants.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Language-specific keys are ergonomic; no accidental inputs
